price: 4 ou un peu plus, en récitant le Coran posément.
arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: aw zid ʿalayhi warattili al-qur'āna tartīlan
